sentences.en: By comparison, a cup of milligram Starbucks brewed coffee contains 330 milligrams in 473 milliliters.
sentences.cn: 通过对比, 一杯473毫升煮好的星巴克咖啡,咖啡因含量为330毫克.

sentences.en: It is approximately asas controlled - release morphine, a milligram per milligram basis , but with lesser adverse effects.
sentences.cn: 临床应用于中、重度癌痛与非癌痛,疗效相当于吗啡控释剂, 等效止痛剂量约为吗啡的一半, 不良反应较少.

sentences.en: RESULTS: The drugs and charred drugs per milligram contain a constant number of microscopic characteristic particles.
sentences.cn: 结果: 一定重量的单味药材和炮制品的显微特征微粒数为一常数.

sentences.en: They said adults should not take more than 650 milligram milligrams a time.
sentences.cn: 他们称成年人一次不能摄入超过650毫克的扑热息痛.

sentences.en: Zemel says that when calcium levels are low, the body releases a hormone that helps squeeze the most out of every available milligram of the mineral.
sentences.cn: 泽莫尔博士说,当人体中的钙含量偏低时, 身体里就会产生一种荷尔蒙,它能帮助肌体最大限度地吸收所摄入的钙.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring weight. There are 1,000 milligrams in one gram.
